Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Avatar Boulevard, just east of Danielle's Magic Shop.
Room.LongDescription: The Mystic Mage Emporium, located on the west side of the road, provides a number of vital potions and spells that could be useful to any mage who finds themselves in a tight spot. Always better to be prepared than dead. The entrance to the shop is on the west side of the shop, off of Necropolis Avenue.
